Laura Gebhart  fights through a downpour to score her second goal of the night in a game against Bucknell on Tuesday October   PERIOD Penn State defetaed Bucknell  PERIOD

Former Penn State AllAmerican Laura Gebhart is returning to the Happy Valley PERIOD

Gebhart was hired as an assistant field hockey coach Tuesday PERIOD She previously served as the head coach and an assistant coach at Bryant for a year each PERIOD

Welcome back Laura Laura Gebhart returns to Penn State field hockey program as an assistant coachhttpst.coGft1dzodDM pic.twitter.comyWolaqwVVD

Gebhart graduated from Penn State in  after racking up numerous honors in her career PERIOD She was a fourtime NFHCA AllAmerican a fourtime first team AllBig Ten honoree and a nominee for NCAA Woman of the Year in  PERIOD

In her career Gebhart put up  points on  goals and  assists PERIOD She helped lead the Nittany Lions to four NCAA tournaments including three appearances in the NCAA quarterfinals PERIOD

Penn State also won two Big Ten Tournament titles and two Big Ten regularseason crowns in her time there PERIOD
